summary: In the midst of WWII, a group of half-witted soldiers led by a slightly smarter sergeant, battle the Germans and especially Von Kraut in the desert.
cast: Gary Kroeger|Gretchen German|Marc Singer|Jennifer Runyon|Andy Greenhalgh|Michael Mears|Bobby Di Cicco|Howard Busgang|Travis McKenna|Andy Bumatai|Chris England|Jeffry Wickham|Peter Dennis|Caitlyn Jenner|Yehuda Efroni|Aviva Marks|Lior Hashin|Zafrir Kochanovsky|Josef Bee|Natasha Lyonne|Tomer Yoseph|Alexander Peleg|Amikam Levi|Yuval Vill|Gabi Shoshan|Don LaFontaine|Ofer Shikartsi
title: A Man Called Sarge
